description: Claude Code settings for AI Project Template

hooks.command: bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]] && [[ -f "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" ]]; then cd backend && uv run ruff format "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --quiet && uv run ruff check "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --fix --quiet; fi'
bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$ ]] && [[ -f "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" ]]; then cd frontend && npm run lint --silent -- "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

PostToolUse.description: Run Django migrations check after model changes

hooks.command: bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == */models.py ]]; then echo "ğŸ” Model file changed. Remember to run: make db-migrate"; fi'

PreToolUse.description: Prevent accidental deletion of critical files

hooks.command: bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_COMMAND" | grep -qE "rm.*(-rf|migrations|.env|settings\.py|manage\.py)"; then echo "âš ï¸  Warning: Attempting to delete critical files. Please confirm this is intentional."; exit 2; fi'
bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_COMMAND" | grep -qE "(DROP|TRUNCATE|DELETE FROM)"; then echo "âš ï¸  Warning: Direct database operation detected. Consider using Django ORM instead."; fi'

Stop.description: Reminder to run tests after significant changes

hooks.command:
bash -c 'if [[ -n "$CLAUDE_SESSION_MODIFIED_FILES" ]]; then echo "

  - make test (run all tests)

UserPromptSubmit.description: Add context about current git branch and status

hooks.command: bash -c 'if command -v git &> /dev/null && git rev-parse --git-dir &> /dev/null; then echo "ğŸ“ Current branch: $(git branch --show-current)"; git status --short | head -5; fi'
